message: zsh-syntax-highlighting - https://github.com/nicoulaj/zsh-syntax-highlighting : Fish style syntax highlighting for Zsh
auto-fu.zsh - https://github.com/hchbaw/auto-fu.zsh : automatic completion as you type
oh-my-zsh - https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh : community-driven framework for managing your zsh configuration
fizsh - http://sourceforge.net/projects/fizsh : Zsh setup to have it behaving more like Fish
zshdb - https://github.com/rocky/zshdb : interactive debugger for zsh
I'm starting to become dependent on the zsh syntax highlighting. Using the command line without it now is like using a text editor without syntax highlighting!
We now have an organization for people hacking around Zsh on Github: https://github.com/zsh-users
